com.atakmap.android.util

Class BorderFrameUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.util.BorderFrameUtil

  • public class BorderFrameUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper methods for adding/removing content from the bordering view frames This is typically used to show color classification bars on the top and bottom of the app screen

    • Field Summary

        public static android.widget.FrameLayout getFrame(int side)
        Given a side of the screen, get the corresponding border frame
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Frame layout or null if N/A
